body.name: Zero Trace All Natural Laundry Detergent Sheets - Fragrance Free, Eco Friendly, 72 Count

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: UNSCENTED FOR SENSITIVE NOSES: Breathe easily with these fragrance free laundry detergent sheets; They’re free from parabens, artificial chemicals, and are never tested on animals; Spice up your laundry routine with he laundry detergent sheets that eliminate odors without hurting your nose

POWERFUL STAIN REMOVAL: Our eco-friendly laundry detergent sheets are specially formulated with PROTECH FORMULA to tackle tough stains, ensuring your clothes look clean and fresh. With their powerful stain-fighting ingredients, these sheets effectively remove dirt, grime, and even stubborn stains like coffee or wine. Say goodbye to unsightly stains and hello to pristine garments with our travel detergent sheets.

SAY GOODBYE TO MESS - Admit it, conventional liquid laundry detergents can be cumbersome and often lead to spills. Besides, they occupy much-needed space. The hassle of accurately dispensing liquid or powder detergent frequently results in waste. But with Zero Trace washer sheets detergent there's no fuss - 1 strip equals 1 load. No measuring, no spills. Simple as that.

SPACE SAVING LAUNDRY SOAP: Smell fresh with these easy to use, space saving, and lightweight laundry sheets for travel; Bring them with you everywhere you go, store them in your carry on, under the sink, or on the washer without taking up too much space. Perfect for college dorms, apartments

IMPROVED PACKAGING FOR BIODEGRADATION: Zero Trace cares deeply about the planet; That’s why we use recyclable packaging, that is biodegradable and leaves behind zero plastic waste; If you’re unsatisfied with your eco-friendly laundry detergent for any reason, let us know and we’ll make it right

SUDS-FREE CONVENIENCE: Tired of dealing with messy spills and suds? Our detergent sheets provide a mess-free and suds-free laundry experience. Say goodbye to measuring and the risk of spills - simply toss a sheet into the washer and let it do the work. Enjoy the convenience of a hassle-free laundry routine with our suds-free detergent sheets.

EFFECTIVE DISSOLUTION: Our laundry detergent sheets are designed to dissolve easily in the washer, even if it is overfilled. This ensures that every load gets the right amount of detergent, resulting in a thorough and effective clean. No more worrying about residue or uneven distribution - our sheets are engineered for optimal dissolution.

MALLEABILITY AND TEXTURE: Our laundry detergent sheets are specially formulated to provide the perfect balance of malleability and texture. This unique combination makes them easy to handle and ensures they dissolve effectively in the washer. No more struggling with clumpy or sticky detergent - our sheets are designed for convenience and ease of use

TRANSPARENT INGREDIENT INFORMATION: We provide detailed information about the ingredients used in our laundry detergent sheets, giving you peace of mind about what you are using on your clothes. We believe in transparency and want you to know exactly what goes into our products. Trust in the quality and safety of our detergent sheets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fresh Scent Baby Friendly Active Wear Fragrance Free Mess Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Heavy Duty Laundry Detergent ✓ 100% Recyclable Packaging ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Plastic Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a Convert!
reviews.reviewText: I really like these laundry sheets. They smell great but are not overwhelming on clothes. I use these for everything including my newborn's clothes and they work great. My baby has not had any bad reaction and the soap doesn't leave any residue on clothes. You also don't need to use more than they say on the package, one sheet is fine for a regular load on clothes, though I do use one and a half for towels. Love this product, I'm absolutely a convert and will be using these from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and versatile!
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this to use on a long vacation so that I wouldn’t have to pack lots of outfits or deal with the hassle of bringing along bulky detergent packs that had to not be smooshed or go through TSA.Tested it out this past weekend at home first and wow! I’m so impressed with it that I’m going to ditch my usual liquid and detergent packs and start using this at home too.Things I love about it: Takes up very little space (full size sheet is smaller than a dryer sheet), Smells really fresh but not overpowering, Weighs nothing/not bulky,Zero mess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars An effective traveling essential
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought these sheets specifically for international travel, because I don't trust detergents I can buy abroad. These travel so well. Except when traveling in hot weather, the sheets tend to really stick together. The scent before use is really quite strong. I was turned off by this. I found this to be unexpected for a natural product. However, after washing, the sheets leave the clothes smelling just right. The clean is also quite effective. Overall I can't complain with this product. Effective, easy to use and travel with and gives the nice subtle aroma after washing, not too offensive to me or others around me. I highly recommend even if not traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great in a washer/dryer combo
reviews.reviewText: I live in a tiny house with a washer/dryer combo. I purchased these sheets because it’s hard to find the detergent that I don’t get rashes from in a small size at the grocery store and prefer to buy in bulk. They don’t take a lot of space, I use a quarter of a sheet, my clothes are getting clean, and I don’t get a rash. So far, so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great eco-friendly detergent
reviews.reviewText: Love these sheets! Laundry comes out clean and smells great (scent isn’t overpowering). Works great for doing laundry while you travel. Love that I no longer have to deal with recycling plastic jugs of detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dissolves well and no noticeable scent
reviews.reviewText: In warm hot and cold they dissolved well. Never had an issue with soap residue on clothes with these. No scent I could notice.Items that were dirty smelling came out not stinky, not fresh smelling though. Neutral. For very soiled items or a very full laundry machine I needed to use 4 segments, and sometimes ended up adding powder tide it needed some help. 2 segments for regular not dirty stuff or a half full laundry machine.For those concerned with waste and chemicals I'd purchase. Good price and results typical with other friendly soaps. Lasted about 3 weeks. Satisfied with the longevity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean clothes, clean environment
reviews.reviewText: Zero Trace works as well as any other detergent. The scent is fresh and clean, but not overpowering. Best of all, Zero Trace doesn’t include the nasty plastic that is overwhelming landfills! I’m hooked!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, cleans perfectly and feels good not polluting the earth!
